caption:
Wondering if it's a good idea to have fragrance in your sunscreen? Let's clear your doubts! ✔️

Fragrances are added in sunscreens only in optimal levels, to mask any strong odours, and at Lakmē we ensure everything is done keeping consumer safety in mind. Check your sunscreen for IFRA compliance and you're in good hands 💛💛
Sun protection never smelt so good 🤩
